  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205384</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fusion: Sha Sha Higby</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schmelzverfahren: Sha Sha Higby</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fusion : Sha Sha Higby</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fusão: Sha Sha Higby</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fusione: Sha Sha Higby</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τήξη: Sha Sha Higby</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fusión: Sha Sha Higby</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Sha Sha Higby's artworks are moving sculptures worn in performances the artist choreographs. This Educator Guide explores traditions of pageantry and theatre, including the masquerade of the Venetian Carnevale, African tribal dancing, Japanese Noh theater and Kabuki, and Commedia dell'Arte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sha Sha Higbys Gestaltungsarbeiten verschieben die
Skulpturen, die in den Leistungen getragen werden, die der Künstler 
choreografiert. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung erforscht Traditionen 
von Pageantry und von Theater, einschließlich die Maskerade des 
venetianischen Carnevale, des afrikanischen Stammes- Tanzens, 
japanischen des Noh Theaters und Kabuki und Commedia des dell'Arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les dessin-modèles de Sha Sha Higby déplacent 
des sculptures portées dans les exécutions que l'artiste 
chorégraphe. Ce guide d'éducateur explore des traditions 
d'apparat et de théâtre, y compris la mascarade du Carnevale 
vénitien, de danser tribal africain, du théâtre japonais de Noh et 
du dell'Arte de Kabuki, et de Commedia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As artes -finais de Sha Sha Higby estão movendo 
os sculptures desgastados nos desempenhos que o artista choreographs. 
Esta guia do educador explora tradições do pageantry e do 
theatre, including o masquerade do Carnevale venetian, de dançar 
tribal africano, do teatro japonês de Noh e do dell'Arte de Kabuki, e
de Commedia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le illustrazioni di Sha Sha Higby stanno spostando
le sculture portate nelle prestazioni che l'artista choreographs. 
Questa guida dell'educatore esplora le tradizioni di pageantry e
del teatro, compreso il masquerade del Carnevale veneziano, ballare 
tribale africano, del teatro giapponese di Noh e del dell'Arte di 
Commedia e di Kabuki.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα έργα τέχνης Sha Higby Sha κινούν τα γλυπτά
που φοριούνται στις αποδόσεις τον καλλιτέχνη choreographs. 
Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών ερευνά τις παραδόσεις 
φαντασμαγορίας και θεάτρου, συμπεριλαμβανομένης της μεταμφίεσης 
του ενετικού Carnevale, του αφρικανικού φυλετικού χορού, του 
ιαπωνικού θεάτρου Noh και του Kabuki, και του Commedia 
dell'Arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las ilustraciones de Sha Sha Higby están moviendo
las esculturas desgastadas en funcionamientos que el artista 
choreographs. Esta guía del educador explora tradiciones del 
boato y del teatro, incluyendo el masquerade del Carnevale veneciano, 
de bailar tribal africano, del teatro japonés de Noh y del dell'Arte 
de Kabuki, y de Commedia.</string>
          </description>
